title: Mt Airy Modern Home w/2 CAR PARKING!!
description:
This is the Mt. Airy home you have been looking for.  Pull right up to your driveway with 2 CAR PARKING and walk up your covered porch to your newer built home with fresh updates throughout. This 3 bed / 1.5 bath is super quiet being set back from the street. First floor – wide, open floor plan, with tons of natural light, powder room and full size laundry. Clean, bright, modern kitchen with tons of storage and all the amenities including gas range, dishwasher, over the range microwave. Garden window above the sink for all your plants and herbs. Huge fenced in back yard with concrete patio + grass yard. 3 ample sized bedrooms, large full bathroom with separate room for bathing/toilet. High efficiency central air/heat, recessed LED lighting, window treatments, and beautiful natural wood doors throughout.
Easy access to bus and regional rail lines as well as Germantown and Mt. Airy attractions, restaurants, cafes, and bars including Adelie Coffee House, Young American Cider, Earth Bread + Brewery, Juice Room, Jansen, Malelani Café  Zsa’s Ice Cream, and the Frosted Fox.
Enjoy living in one of the most proudly diverse and historical zip codes in the nation with easy access to some of the regions best outdoor areas including the Wissahickon Valley Park /hiking and biking trails, Pastorious Park, Carpenters Woods, Cresheim Valley and much more.
Tenant pays all utilities. First month, last month and security deposit due at lease signing.

title: Beautiful One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge
-On site washer and dryer
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-This is a cat friendly community
-24/7 emergency maintenance service

description:
Phenomenal Flat-level 1 Bedroom in New Ultra-Modern Building Welcome to 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. With an awareness of the vibrant, surrounding neighborhood, the builder took great care to provide high-quality sound reducing windows and walls to provide a relaxing home environment. About Fishtown and Northern Liberties: Located in the heart of Fishtown, just a half block off of Girard Ave and two blocks from Frankford Ave. 1141 N Front is walking distance of the best dining and entertainment around: The Fillmore, Fette Sau, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Mulherin's, Sugarhouse, the Piazza at Schmidt's, and much more. Steps to public transit options - the Market-Frankford Line, the Girard trolley, and SEPTA buses as well as quick access to I-95 and Columbus Ave.

title: Rarely available south-facing two bedroom, two bathroom
description:
Rarely available south-facing two bedroom, two bathroom with an open kitchen boasting flat-panel wood cabinetry; granite countertops; a stainless steel GE Profile gas range with built-in microwave; a stainless steel Whirlpool dishwasher; and a built-in, stainless steel Sub-Zero refrigerator with two freezer drawers. The great room has ample space for both a living room and dining room with a chandelier perfect for a dining table. The primary bedroom has brand new wall-to-wall carpet; a customized walk-in closet; and a laundry closet with a stackable Asko washer and dryer; the large ensuite bathroom is appointed in marble and has a double vanity and walk-in glass shower. The second bedroom has a wall closet and enjoys use of the adjacent full hall bathroom that is appointed in marble.There are Brazilian cherry wood floors in the foyer, kitchen and great room. Residents of Parc Rittenhouse enjoy world class amenities and services including a 24 hour doorman; an amenities suite with a state-of-the-art fitness center and resident lounge with pantry; media room; outdoor rooftop pool club with a large pool deck, full size pool, kids pool and hot tub. There is garage parking below the building for an additional fee; and three amazing restaurants on the ground floor, Stephen Starr's Parc, Devon Seafood and Via Locusta. Location is everything: Rittenhouse Square is ranked the 6th best neighborhood in North America by Places Rated Almanac. There are 175 restaurants and 199 retailers within a three block radius. Within close walking distance to the Market Street office corridor, The Avenue of the Arts and University City. 30th Street Station and Philadelphia International Airport are only minutes away.

title: Looking for a third roommate !
description:
Hi everyone! Two roommates are looking for someone to fill a bedroom in our East Kensington apartment. We’ve lived here just about a year, and it’s been great. There’s plenty of space, a giant roof deck, and it’s only a block away from the York/Dauphin stop on the El, so getting around the city is super easy. Parking is never a problem either. The open bedroom is on the first floor and has a cute balcony. Your bathroom is right outside the bedroom. Rent is $1000 a month + utilities so altogether it’s ~$1000. title: @@Very tidy and clean house available for rent@@
description:
Welcome home to 970-74 Leithgow Street. This property consists of TWO parcels. The main property sits on a large 20 ft wide lot and the neighboring parcel is used for one car parking and side yard. There is an opportunity to expand the parking to allow for two cars. As you enter the large open concept family room you will be greeted with 9+ ft ceilings and stunning hardwoods(2021). The kitchen was redone in 2021 with brand new custom cabinets, white quartz countertop, stainless steel appliances, and gorgeous tile backsplash. Off the kitchen is a patio with a built in gas line and access to the side yard. On the second level you will find two generously sized guest rooms with ample closet space. The landing area is perfect for office space with access to a private patio. The second floor is complete with a full bathroom with a large tub and laundry. The primary suite is where you will fall in love. The gorgeous glass rail guard leads you to the suite which encompasses the entire third floor. Large walk-in closet with custom organizers, two seating areas, wet bar, and bathroom which was updated in 2020. Off the primary, a spiral staircase takes you to the roof deck. THE VIEWS! Oh my, you will love the 360 degree views of the city. The basement is fully finished with 9 ft ceilings, custom storage cabinets, projector, full bathroom, and large patio area. New HVAC (2021). One year remaining on tax abatement. The adjoining parcel has endless opportunities! You can expand the parking area for two cars or make it a stunning garden! Located on a one-way, quiet street, in the heart of Northern Liberties. Yet, steps from the most popular spots this neighborhood features: cafe La Maude, Honey's Sit "˜n Eat, Standard tap, Jerry's Bar, North Third, Liberty Lands Park, Orianna Hill Dog Park, The Piazza, Heirloom (Giant Grocery), Acme Grocery, and so much more!
For more information and pictures call 🏠 ☎️  show contact info

The studio apartment home at 610 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 6th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as June 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 6th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 610 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Resmate, our robot concierge on our website. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
1-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

title: Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge, Beautiful courtyards, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Beautiful, new construction row home for rent
description:
Massive, brand new construction home a mile from the heart of the city with a large basement, rooftop with city skyline view, master suite with walk-in closet, wet bar and master suite balcony and many other amenities. The design is stunning with white Calcutta quartz finishes and top of the line, brand new appliances. The home is barely used as the owner worked in a different state. Nest and Ring systems for security and temperature control. This house is on a very safe street with friendly neighbors that are always around to help.
The house comes partially furnished. If it is preferred to be unfurnished, it is up for discussion.
This is the perfect home for a couple or a family! It's a quiet and safe block just close enough to everything you need.
Renter is responsible for all amenities from electricity, gas, water and internet/ cable. Parking is street parking which is easy to find once you learn the schedule. No smoking allowed in the home. Last months rent due at signing. Pets are allowed but owner is responsible for any damage the pets may incur on the house. Lease is 1-year and will require a background check. During the winter, the renter is responsible to shovel the sidewalk.

title: This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes.
description:
Phenomenal Flat-level 1 Bedroom in New Ultra-Modern Building Welcome to 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. This apartment is 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. title: Beautiful home in Grad Hospital with garage & roof deck
description:
This beautiful 3-story home is located within a 5-minute walk of Sprouts, Target, Starbucks, the PHS Beer Garden, Bob & Barbara's, Rex at the Royal, and more.
3000+ square feet of living space, including 3 large bedrooms (with possibility to use basement as 4th br), 6 bathrooms (4 full, 2 half), multiple living spaces, huge kitchen with Viking stove and new Miele dishwasher and Maytag stainless steel refrigerator, new roof deck with Center City skyline views, and oversized garage with room for car plus storage & additional fridge.
Each bedroom has its own full bath; 2 of them have both jacuzzi tubs and walk-in showers. There is also an additional full bathroom with laundry on the second floor. Basement has built-in storage shelves and additional half bath.
Dogs allowed with additional deposit. Available July 1, August 1, or in between as needed.
